Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer® Luer-Lok™ Access Device and BD Vacutainer® Blood Transfer Device for safe closed-system collection and transfer of venous blood into evacuated tubes or culture bottles
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use by healthcare professionals for closed-system venous blood collection from a catheter port or blood collection set and for needleless transfer of blood from BD Luer-Lok™ syringes into evacuated blood collection tubes or blood culture bottles for in vitro diagnostic testing.
